creator: hubtiger
descriptionHtml:
Hubtiger is an all-in-one bike management app. Track the mileage of your bicycle components and be notified when they require maintenance, book a service at your local bike shop, connect your bike GPS & plan bike routes according to detailed weather forecasts, road information and much more.Powered by Strava, Hubtiger is here to make riding & managing your bike simple, safe and stress free.

WHY CYCLISTS LOVE HUBTIGER

✔️Track mileage & usage on individual bike components
✔️Log service & maintenance history of your bicycle
✔️Supports component tracking for multiple bikes
✔️Book a bike service directly through the app with Hubtiger partners
✔️Detailed weather forecasts, elevation information & more for bike routes
✔️Potholes, road accidents and dangerous areas highlighted on the map
✔️Coming soon –seamlessly stay in touch with other cyclists & clubs
✔️Easily connect to Strava & other bike GPS trackers

COMPONENT USAGE & MAINTENANCE TRACKING

Know when your bike requires maintenance –with Hubtiger you can track the mileage of every component on your bike so you know exactly when it needs to be serviced or replaced. Log the bicycle service history and even book a service with your local Hubtiger partner shop directly from the app!

⛅ PLAN YOUR BIKE RIDES

Hubtiger features an advanced weather prediction module which informs you about the elevation, wind speed, wind direction, temperature and chance of increment weather on your favorite bike routes. Now you can plan your rides easily, minimizing the chances of getting caught in bad weather or unsafe conditions.

CONNECT TO STRAVA & BIKE GPS TRACKERS

You can connect Strava and your bike GPS tracker to Hubtiger to make the app an even more powerful tool to take on your bike rides. After all, why use two apps when you can just use one?!You’ll be able to track, share and analyse your bike rides seamlessly from within the app and enjoy all of the other Hubtiger features.

 RIDE SAFELY

Using the interactive map you’ll be able to stay safe while cycling. Take a look at reported incidents such as bike theft, road accidents and dangerous potholes around your bike route so you know which areas to avoid.

COMING SOON –CYCLING CLUB & SOCIAL FEATURES

We’re working to bring the cycling community closer by allowing cyclists and their clubs to connect directly through the app. You’ll be able to plan group bike rides, meet new friends to cycle with and keep in touch with other members of your club.

MANAGE YOUR BIKE& PLAN ROUTES SAFELY –DOWNLOAD HUBTIGER TODAY!
descriptionShort: Track bike component usage, maintenance & repair. Plan route, connect GPS & more

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: You can now add/replace and service components directly from the invoice screen after your bike has been serviced at a participating bike shop. We have also added the ability for you to upload your invoice or other attachments directly to your service job cards, so if you log services or have your bike booked in at a bike shop, you can attach the important invoices for later retrieval. Lastly, we have also added the French language.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Some of the changes include:
- A more simplistic view for cyclists interested in only managing their bikes services etc.
- You can now also provide feedback to your bike shop when rating them after doing a service.
- You'll be able to see any attachments on your job card that your bike shop may attach during the service or after.
- Bug fixes and other small changes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this version, we have updated the service book-in process to allow you to update your personal details at checkout.
We have also fixed a few bugs and added a changes to the book-in process to align with changes to our Hubtiger workshop management system.

MANAGE YOUR BIKE& PLAN ROUTES SAFELY –DOWNLOAD HUBTIGER TODAY!
descriptionShort: Track bike component usage, maintenance & repair. Plan route, connect GPS & more

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Fixed an issue that prevented the app from starting on Android 8 devices, also fixed a bug that caused the app to crash on certain versions of Android.

title: Hubtiger: Bike Management

creator: hubtiger
descriptionHtml:
From tracking component usage and service history to joining group rides, Hubtiger is the ultimate bike management tool for cyclists. Powered by Strava, Hubtiger app is here to make riding and managing your bike simple and stress-free.

WHY CYCLISTS LOVE HUBTIGER
- Keep track of wear-and-tear on individual bike components.
- Supports component tracking for multiple bikes.
- Log service & maintenance history of your bike.
- Easily book a service or bike fitting at your local bike shop.
- Meet other cycling enthusiasts and discover new routes.

USAGE & MAINTENANCE TRACKING - Keep track of wear-and-tear down to component level.
Track the mileage of every component on your bike so you know exactly when it needs to be serviced or replaced.

SERVICE & FITTING BOOKINGS - Your direct connection to local bike shops.
Conveniently book a service or a bike fitting at a local bike shop within the app and easily send and receive messages to stay in the loop on your bike's progress during repairs.
If you do your own services, you can also record services with notes and attachments of your self-service.

GROUP RIDES - Expand your riding circle & pick up a few pointers
Take your cycling to the next level while making new friends with group rides. Easily find and join upcoming group rides near you.

MANAGE YOUR BIKE AND RIDE MORE – DOWNLOAD HUBTIGER TODAY!
descriptionShort: Track bike component usage, maintenance & repair. Plan route, connect GPS & more
